content:
I want to know all actors and actresses born on a specific day on July, Can you provide me with the list?
Begin!

I'll help you retrieve the list of actors and actresses born on a specific day in July. Since you didn't specify the exact day, I'll use the 27th as an example.

Thought: I'll use the actors_list_born_today_for_online_movie_database function to get the list of actors and actresses born on July 27th.

Thought: I see a list of actor/actress IDs born on July 27th. However, the function only provides their unique identifiers. Unfortunately, I don't have a direct way to convert these IDs to their actual names with the current set of tools.

Let me provide a comprehensive response to the user.

function.arguments: {"return_type": "give_answer", "final_answer": "I found 25 actors and actresses born on July 27th! However, the current tool only provides their unique identifiers. The list contains 25 unique movie industry professionals born on this date, represented by their IMDb name IDs. To get their actual names, you would need to look up each ID individually on IMDb or a similar movie database."}
function.name: Finish
